issues.message: Consider using more general type 'System.Reflection.IReflect' instead of 'System.Type'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ActorSystem' instead of 'Akka.Actor.ExtendedActorSystem'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IEquatable<Akka.Actor.IActorRef>' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Consider using more general type 'System.IEquatable<Akka.Actor.IActorRef>' instead of 'Akka.Actor.IActorRef'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Actor.ActorSystem' instead of 'Akka.Actor.ExtendedActorSystem'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Routing.Pool' instead of 'Akka.Routing.FromConfig'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Routing.Pool' instead of 'Akka.Routing.RoundRobinPool'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Routing.Pool' instead of 'Akka.Routing.BroadcastPool'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Routing.Pool' instead of 'Akka.Routing.RandomPool'.
Consider using more general type 'Akka.Routing.Pool' instead of 'Akka.Routing.ConsistentHashingPool'.
Consider using more general type 'System.Exception' instead of 'DotNetty.Transport.Channels.ConnectException'.
